alert.note: Alert for Greensville; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 3:11PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Greensville and southwestern Sussex Counties and the City of Emporia through 345 PM EDT... At 311 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jarratt, or near Emporia. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Emporia, Jarratt, Fields Crossroads, Durand, Emporia Reservoir, Slagles Lake, Emporia Airport and Cowie Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
